title: Amish Court Hearings to be Featured on The West Side February 23
teaser: Recent Amish family court hearings in Eau Claire County were the focus of discussion on The West Side. Host Rich Kremer welcomed Matthew Krische, an attorney representing two Amish families, David Mortimer, a religious scholar and member of the National Committee for Amish Religious Freedom and Republican State Representative Kathy Bernier.
